Message: That’s why I love it here.

Life is short, but this world
lives it to the fullest.

But then there’s
the Witch Hunt,
and many other stupid
and depressing things here.

And yet...that’s exactly why
there’s life here that exists
so strong and beautifully.

I wanna keep watching
that kind of life.

Ideally, from up close
and personal,
not somewhere
far off in the distance.

...That’s why I’m wandering
around from place to place
like this.
